thread.title: Russell Westbrook takes credit for keeping Vine alive in hilarious new commercial
thread.title_full: Russell Westbrook takes credit for keeping Vine alive in hilarious new commercial

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Russell Westbrook takes credit for keeping Vine alive in hilarious new commercial
text:
Russell Westbrook takes credit for keeping Vine alive in hilarious new commercial Bill Russell's guest spot is perfect. Post to Facebook Russell Westbrook takes credit for keeping Vine alive in hilarious new commercial Bill Russell's guest spot is perfect.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/russell-westbrook-takes-credit-for-keeping-vine-alive-in-hilarious-new-commercial/   Russell Westbrook takes credit for keeping Vine alive in hilarious new commercial Adi Joseph , USA TODAY Sports 4:57 p.m. ET Feb. 7, 2017 
Russell Westbrook is sick of being asked about triple-doubles . That doesn't mean he doesn't want to talk about stats. This new Foot Locker commercial features a bunch of fun ones: Crashes into 1.7 cameramen per night (note: not game) 2 times more parental neglect than any other player League-leader in minutes talking to himself intently Kept Vine alive for an addition 7.4 months Appears in 72 percent of opposing coaches' nightmares 
Westbrook closes with a bold statement: "Plus, I'm the all-time greatest Russell in league history." 
"Oh, really?" Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/russell-westbrook-takes-credit-for-keeping-vine-alive-in-hilarious-new-commercial/ Most Popular
